com.github.uberroot.NCJBot.api

Class ProcessorJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.uberroot.NCJBot.api.ProcessorJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public abstract class ProcessorJob
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

    This abstract class provides the interface between external code and the node. All code to be run by nodes must inherit from this class.

    Author:
    Carter Waxman

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ProcessorJobWrapper owner
      The wrapper for this job for handling privileged fields.

      Creates a new instance of the ProcessorJob subclass.

    • Method Detail

      • getOwner

        public final ProcessorJobWrapper getOwner()

        Gets the ProcessorJobWrapper that runs this subclass of ProcessorJob.

        Returns:
        The ProcessorJobWrapper that runs this subclass of ProcessorJob.

      • init

        public abstract void init(java.io.File initData)
                   throws java.lang.Exception

        Provides initialization arguments to the ProcessorJob. This allows subclasses to perform basic initialization before performing their main methods.

        Parameters:
        initData - Initialization parameters for the job.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • dataReceived

        public abstract void dataReceived(RemoteNode source,
                java.lang.String remotePid,
                java.io.File data)

        This method is called when new data has be received by the node that has been directed at the ProcessorJob subclass.

        Parameters:
        source - The node that send the data/
        remotePid - The thread ID of the job that sent the data.
        data - The data received.

      • nodeFound

        public abstract void nodeFound(RemoteNode rn)

        This method is called when a new node has been discovered by this node.

        Parameters:
        rn - The node discovered.

      • nodeFailed

        public abstract void nodeFailed(RemoteNode rn)

        This method is called when the watchdog notices a lapse in beacons, indicating a node failure. All jobs sent to this node that have note returned should be assumed lost.

        Parameters:
        rn - The node that failed.
